articles.title: UK boy's parents appeal to European court to keep his life support - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: Archie Battersbee was due to have his life support at the Royal London Hospital ended at 10am this morning.
articles.content:
THE PARENTS OF a 12-year-old UK boy have appealed to European judges to maintain his life support, in another high-profile medical ethics case for Britain.

articles.title: Archie Battersbee: Parents to take case to European Court of Human Rights - BBC
articles.description: The 12-year-old's life support was due to be withdrawn on Wednesday morning.
articles.content:
Archie Battersbee's parents have submitted an application to the European Court of Human Rights (ECHR) in a bid to postpone the withdrawal of his life support.
